steps.title: Basics
steps.description: Master the fundamentals of React.js, including JSX syntax, components, props, state, and lifecycle methods.

steps.title: State Management
steps.description: Explore different state management solutions like React Context API, Redux, or MobX.

steps.title: Advanced Topics
steps.description: Dive deeper into advanced topics like routing, hooks, performance optimization, and server-side rendering in React.js.

steps.title: Real-world Projects
steps.description: Apply your knowledge to develop complex projects that showcase your expertise and problem-solving abilities.

steps.title: Learn Basics
steps.description: Start with the basics of Node.js, including asynchronous programming and modules.

steps.title: Build Simple Servers
steps.description: Create basic Node.js servers to understand routing, middleware, and HTTP requests.

steps.title: Explore Express.js
steps.description: Learn Express.js framework for building web applications and RESTful APIs.

steps.title: Database Integration
steps.description: Integrate databases like MongoDB or MySQL with Node.js using Mongoose or Sequelize.

steps.title: Develop Scalable Applications
steps.description: Apply best practices to develop scalable Node.js applications suitable for production environments.

steps.title: Understand Blockchain Basics
steps.description: Learn the fundamentals of blockchain technology and its applications.

steps.title: Setup Ethereum Development Environment
steps.description: Install Ethereum clients like Geth or Parity and set up a local development environment.

steps.title: Smart Contract Development
steps.description: Learn Solidity programming language for writing smart contracts on the Ethereum platform.

steps.title: Decentralized Applications (DApps)
steps.description: Develop decentralized applications (DApps) using Ethereum and web3.js library.

steps.title: Testing and Deployment
steps.description: Test and deploy smart contracts and DApps on the Ethereum blockchain.
